translations.We are going to proceed with your cloud: We are going to proceed with your cloud account suppression. Check the box below if you also want to delete the associated shop account.
translations.For your information you have %d orders: For your information you have %d orders in your account.
translations.I also want to delete my shop account: I also want to delete my shop account
translations.If you want to keep your shop account pl: If you want to keep your shop account please validate or modify the email address below. This email address will become your new login to the shop.
translations.Error while setting shop delete preferen: Error while setting shop delete preference
translations.Shop email cannot be same as this accoun: Shop email cannot be same as this account's email!
